description: Approval of Details pursuant to condition 20 (passive design details) of planning permission reference P121277 dated 21/2/2014 for the Demolition of existing building and structures on the site and erection of 2 buildings, comprising of a 5 storey plus basement/lower ground building facing onto Canonbury Road and a building facing onto Compton Avenue and Edwards Cottages ranging between 4, 3 and 2 storeys all of which are plus a basement/lower ground level .  The buildings will provide for 90 residential units comprising of flats, maisonettes and townhouses.  The proposals include the provision of cycle and refuse stores, plant room, substation, provision of soft and hard landscaping, creation of 2 disabled parking bays and other associated works.  The application constitutes a land use change from operations within the permitted A1 (Retail) use class to C3 (Dwelling houses) use class.
